name: VTDL - Virtual Technological Dev. Lab
short_description: VTDL is a Virtual Technological Development Lab, VTDL, is OS independant and web based. this programs intent is to use MMO's and the internet in a new way, we will construct a virtual online lab environment, with working physics and machine tools
